title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Hareluya_II_Boy
transformers_text: Hare lu ya II Boy stylized a sHARE LU YA II B Y also known simply as B y is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Haru to U mez awa It is a sequel to U mez awa ' sHare lu ya serialized in Shueisha's sh nen manga magazine Weekly Sh nen Jumpin 1992 Hare lu ya II Boy was serialized in the same magazine from November 1992 to February 1999 with its chapters collected in 33 tank bon volumes A 25 episode anime television series adaptation by Triangle Staff was broadcast on TV Tokyo from April to September 1997 The anime series has been licensed by Sentai Film works Written and illustrated by Haru to U mez awa the first series Hare lu ya j a was serialized in Shueisha's sh nen manga magazine Weekly Sh nen Jump from June 15 to August 17 1992 3 4 Shueisha collected the chapters in a single tank bon volume released on January 7 1993 5 Hare lu ya II Boy was serialized in the same magazine from November 30 1992 6 to February 8 1999 7 Shueisha collected its chapters in thirty three tank bon volumes released from May 1 1993 8 to April 7 1999 9 A twenty five episodes anime television series by Triangle Staff was broadcast on TV Tokyo from April 8 to September 30 1997 10 2 The Japanese bandS pyke performed the opening theme Tight Break j a and the ending themes Words of Free and Closet Freak Ku roze t to Fur ku 11 In November 2021 Sentai Film works announced that they had licensed the series It is set to be streamed worldwide in select digital outlets and it will be also released on home video 12
